evidence.text: The motion is GRANTED to the extent it seeks dismissal of the second amended complaint as a shotgun pleading.

extracted.value: Motion to dismiss granted in part: second amended complaint dismissed without prejudice as a shotgun pleading

evidence.text: The motion is DENIED to the extent it seeks dismissal of the complaint for lack of jurisdiction.

extracted.value: Motion to dismiss denied in part: complaint not dismissed for lack of jurisdiction

evidence.text: The second amended complaint is DISMISSED without prejudice. Within fourteen (14) days of the entry of this order, the plaintiffs may file another amended complaint to address the pleading deficiencies.

extracted.value: Second amended complaint dismissed without prejudice; plaintiffs allowed 14 days to file amended complaint addressing pleading deficiencies

evidence.text: The claims against Perry are DISMISSED without prejudice.

extracted.value: Claims against Perry dismissed without prejudice

evidence.text: The § 1985(3) claims against all the defendants are DISMISSED with prejudice.
The motion is GRANTED to the extent it seeks dismissal of the claims for compensatory damages to the extent they are based on emotional or mental injury.

extracted.value: Compensatory damages claims for emotional/mental injury dismissed
